languages.text: {n}Соломон складывает руки на груди и возводит глаза к люменам на сводах.{/n} "Я, разрази меня Лекс, даже не знаю, с чего начать. Стракс оставил мне руины, и Арбитес придется компенсировать его позор и свою малую численность служением яростным и внушающим благоговейный ужас. Я перекую арбитров в новую элиту и начну писать Лекс Коронус — кровью тех, кто хоть в чем-то дерзнет не покориться нам".

{n}Solomorne folds his arms and looks up at the lumens on the ceiling.{/n} "By the Lex, I don't even know where to start... Strachs has left me only ruins, and now, the Arbites will have to make up for his disgrace and its own paltry numbers with fierce service such as to inspire terror and awe. I will reforge the Arbitrators into a new elite and begin writing the Lex Koronus in the blood of any who dare show defiance in the face of our mission."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон складывает руки на груди и возводит глаза к люменам на сводах.{/n} "Я, разрази меня Лекс, даже не знаю, с чего начать. Стракс оставил мне руины, и Арбитес придется компенсировать его позор и свою малую численность служением яростным и внушающим благоговейный ужас. Я перекую арбитров в новую элиту и начну писать Лекс Коронус — кровью тех, кто хоть в чем-то дерзнет не покориться нам".

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組み、天井の照明を見上げた。{/n}「レックス・インペリアにかけて、どこから手をつければいいのかもわかりません…ストラッチスが残したのは、瓦礫ばかりです。今や高等裁定局は、彼の不名誉と、自身の乏しい戦力を補うために、恐怖と畏敬をもって人々に刻まれるような苛烈な奉仕で応えるしかありません。アービトレイターたちを鍛え直して、新たな精鋭部隊として再生させます。そして任務に背を向ける者の血でレックス・コロヌスを書き始めるつもりです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and looks up at the lumens on the ceiling.{/n} "By the Lex, I don't even know where to start... Strachs has left me only ruins, and now, the Arbites will have to make up for his disgrace and its own paltry numbers with fierce service such as to inspire terror and awe. I will reforge the Arbitrators into a new elite and begin writing the Lex Koronus in the blood of any who dare show defiance in the face of our mission."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne verschränkt die Arme und blickt hinauf zu den Lumen an der Decke.{/n} "Beim Lex, ich weiß nicht einmal, wo ich anfangen soll ... Strachs hat mir nur Ruinen hinterlassen, und jetzt muss das Arbites seine Schmach und die eigene erbärmliche Truppenstärke mit einem unbeugsamen Dienst wiedergutmachen, der für Angst und Ehrfurcht sorgt. Ich werde die Arbitratoren zu einer neuen Elite schmieden und das Lex Koronus mit dem Blut aller schreiben, die es wagen, im Angesicht unserer Mission Widerstand zu zeigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and looks up at the lumens on the ceiling.{/n} "By the Lex, I don't even know where to start... Strachs has left me only ruins, and now, the Arbites will have to make up for his disgrace and its own paltry numbers with fierce service such as to inspire terror and awe. I will reforge the Arbitrators into a new elite and begin writing the Lex Koronus in the blood of any who dare show defiance in the face of our mission."

Ich werde die Arbitratoren zu einer neuen Elite schmieden und das Lex Koronus mit dem Blut aller schreiben, die es wagen, im Angesicht unserer Mission Widerstand zu zeigen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras et lève les yeux pour fixer les lumens au plafond.{/n} « Par la Lex, je ne sais même pas par où commencer... Strachs n'a laissé qu'un champ de ruines dans son sillage... L'Arbites va donc avoir la lourde tâche de compenser cette disgrâce et ses effectifs réduits en redoublant d'ardeur pour à nouveau inspirer l'effroi. Je vais reforger les arbitrators afin de former une nouvelle élite et commencer à rédiger la Lex Koronus avec le sang de quiconque osera s'élever contre notre noble mission. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and looks up at the lumens on the ceiling.{/n} "By the Lex, I don't even know where to start... Strachs has left me only ruins, and now, the Arbites will have to make up for his disgrace and its own paltry numbers with fierce service such as to inspire terror and awe. I will reforge the Arbitrators into a new elite and begin writing the Lex Koronus in the blood of any who dare show defiance in the face of our mission."

Strachs n'a laissé qu'un champ de ruines dans son sillage... L'Arbites va donc avoir la lourde tâche de compenser cette disgrâce et ses effectifs réduits en redoublant d'ardeur pour à nouveau inspirer l'effroi. Je vais reforger les arbitrators afin de former une nouvelle élite et commencer à rédiger la Lex Koronus avec le sang de quiconque osera s'élever contre notre noble mission. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos y levanta la vista hacia los lumens del techo.{/n} «Por la Lex, ni siquiera sé por dónde empezar... Strachs solamente me ha dejado ruinas, y ahora el Arbites tendrá que compensar su deshonra y la escasez de efectivos con un celo tan encarnizado que infunda terror y respeto. Convertiré a los Arbitrator en una fuerza de élite y redactaré la Lex Koronus con la sangre de quienes osen desafiar el propósito de nuestra misión».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and looks up at the lumens on the ceiling.{/n} "By the Lex, I don't even know where to start... Strachs has left me only ruins, and now, the Arbites will have to make up for his disgrace and its own paltry numbers with fierce service such as to inspire terror and awe. I will reforge the Arbitrators into a new elite and begin writing the Lex Koronus in the blood of any who dare show defiance in the face of our mission."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙交叉着双臂，抬起头，看着天花板上的流明灯。{/n}“帝国的律法在上，我根本不知道该如何重新开始……斯塔克斯只给我留下了一片废墟。如今，所有法务官都不得不通过极其激进的手段，让所有人心怀恐惧与敬畏，从而弥补他带来的耻辱与我们人数不足的劣势。我会将这些法务官重新锻炼成帝国的精英。若是有任何人胆敢蔑视我们，我们就要用那些人的鲜血书写科罗努斯的法典。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and looks up at the lumens on the ceiling.{/n} "By the Lex, I don't even know where to start... Strachs has left me only ruins, and now, the Arbites will have to make up for his disgrace and its own paltry numbers with fierce service such as to inspire terror and awe. I will reforge the Arbitrators into a new elite and begin writing the Lex Koronus in the blood of any who dare show defiance in the face of our mission."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, kollarını kavuşturup tavandaki ışıklara bakıyor.{/n} "Lex aşkına, nereden başlayacağımı bile bilmiyorum... Strachs bana harabeden başka bir şey bırakmamış. Şimdi de Arbites onun rezaletini ve yetersiz mevkilerini korku ve dehşet uyandıran şiddetli bir hizmetle telafi etmek zorunda kalacak. Yargıcıları yeni bir seçkinler sınıfına dönüştüreceğim ve görevimize karşı çıkmaya cüret edenlerin kanıyla Lex Koronus'u yazacağım."
